problem.markdown:
name = "Jin Xu"

if type(name) == type("Hello"):
    print(name, "is a string entry")
else:
    print(name, "is not a string entry")

The output of the above line of code is ___

( ) "Hello Jin Xu" ( ) "Jin Xu is a not string entry" (x) "Jin Xu is a string entry" ( ) "string"

multiplechoiceresponse.p: The output of the above line of code is ___

choicegroup.choice: "Jin Xu is a not string entry"
